amendment.description: Amendment requires a background check on a person whose gun is returned to him by a pawnshop if that gun has been stored at the pawnshop for more than 1 year.
amendment.purpose: An amendment no. 8 and printed in part B of H. Rept. 106-186 to require a background check for guns pawned for more than one year before the gun is returned to its owner.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Sessions amendment (A007) Agreed to by recorded vote: 247 - 181 (Roll no. 239).
